Author: lightsflicker
Text: did the person show you the shape they were going for beforehand? did you speak abt what you wanted to be done?? i find it really difficult to speak up in situations like that, but i did once (paid Â£80 for an awful hair colour job - left an orange band around my scalp) and they offered me to come in the next morning. they fixed it free of charge + gave me freebies! i think you should deffo speak up, call the salon and tell them you are displeased with the quality of the job. sorry this happened to u - i hope you get ur eyebrows back! x
